programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1790
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep882
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon II: Wild Wild Bunch
programme.desc: Starring four Hong Kong Film Awards Best Actors, Simon Yam, Louis Koo, Tony Leung Ka Fai and Gordon Lam, this action-thriller follows the real-life kidnapping events that terrorized Hong Kong’s elite in the 1990s by serial billionaire-kidnapper Logan and his gang.

programme.title: Running Out Of Time
programme.desc: When a cancer-ridden criminal sets out to seek vengeance on Hong Kong's organized crime syndicates, police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung Sang finds himself pulled into a 72-hour battle of wits and courage.

programme.title: May We Chat
programme.desc: Yan, Wei Wei and Yi Ji are three troubled young women from very different backgrounds who met on We Chat, a social media platform, and will do anything to escape each of their troubled lives. When Yan suddenly disappears one day, Wei Wei and Yi Ji start to track her whereabouts, only to find out shocking truths about her that were never revealed.

programme.title: As The Light Goes Out
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve in Hong Kong, a Team of firefighters battle an out-of-control warehouse fire that threatens to plunge the entire city into darkness. The team must put their differences aside and come together for an ultimate battle to stop the fire spreading to a nearby power plant.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A killer and a stage actor accidentally swapped their identities at a bathhouse. The actor must complete the killer’s mission while the killer thinks he is a hopeless actor after losing his memory during the accident. When the killer strives to become a successful stage actor, he also starts to recall what has happened…

programme.title: Hand Rolled Cigarette
programme.desc: A retired British-Chinese soldier becomes a target in a triad manhunt when he takes in a young South Asian man who carries a bag of stolen drugs. Forced to live together, the two men transcend conflicts and cultural differences to form a beautiful friendship in this poignant tale of loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the country’s energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Bio Raiders
programme.desc: Famed doctor Mo Tian Shi (Richard Ng) concocts an immortality medicine to save his terminally ill daughter Xiao Xin, but the cost for immortality is that she must drink human blood. Twenty years later, Mo's apprentice Li Yao Shi (Chin Siu Ho) returns to town and notices something is amiss, only to realise the horror is just about to begin…

programme.title: A Wedding Invitation
programme.desc: A boy’s marriage proposal was rejected by the girl and the lovers separated. Nonetheless, they agree on a break-up contract stating that if both are single in five years they will get married. Can they finally be together?

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon
programme.desc: Infamous real-life drug kingpin Crippled Ho came to Hong Kong as an illegal immigrant in 1963, and ruthlessly carved an empire from the chaotic underworld of drug dealers and corrupt police who ruled the city under notorious detective Lee Rock.

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face life’s mounting hardships.

programme.title: Detective Dee and Nine-storey Demon Building
programme.desc: A series of strange incidents happen at the Tang’s demon building but Detective Dee finds no clue. Dee finds the master of the family suspicious when he speaks with him, and when the eldest daughter Miss Tang secretly informs Dee about Mr Tang’s strange behavior and the fact that she is kept under surveillance, Dee vows to unveil the truth.

programme.title: Temporary Family
programme.desc: Hong Kong residential property is reported to be the most expensive in the world. Four young Hong Kong residents, each having their own issues, fall into a property speculation trap and are forced to live together in their new flat.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: Ip Man
programme.desc: Wing Chun grandmaster Ip Man’s matchless fighting skills are revered all over China. Set during the Sino-Japanese War, Ip Man is forced to leave his home and work to support his family. With only his martial arts skills, he reluctantly agrees to train others in the art of Wing Chun for self-defense.

programme.title: Nightfall
programme.desc: Detective George Lam investigates the brutal death of a Sino-British conductor and suspects he is murdered by Wong Yuen Yeung, a dumb killer who has just been released from prison. When out on a manhunt for Wong, Lam finds more revelations to the contrary and has to pursue every possibility, taking him deep into Wong’s past.

programme.title: Wine War
programme.desc: A Chinese wine expert residing in France is contacted by his childhood buddy in China to help him bid for a famous bottle of vintage wine in an auction. Little did he realize he is about to enter an age-old feud between rivaling vineyards and discover a historical mystery that might shatter the whole wine industry.

programme.title: Europe Raiders
programme.desc: Mr Lin and Miss Wang are the two top bounty hunters in the business, and are searching for the destructive missile “Hand of God” to prove who is the better bounty hunter. They soon realize they are not the only ones after the missile. Will Lin and Wang put their differences aside and work together in search for the ‘Hand of God’?

programme.title: Coffin Homes
programme.desc: Three bizarre tales intertwine in this horror satire set against the housing crisis of Hong Kong, where soaring property prices have driven dwellers to take every insane effort necessary to secure a cramped space, even if it means sharing the same roof with the dead!

programme.title: Napping Kid
programme.desc: Xiao Ru’s financial analysis for a bank client was stolen online. A ransom has to be paid within three days or else the document would be disclosed. To protect the client’s data, the company brings in the police to investigate. In the meantime, an analyst disappears and the Technical Director resigns. Is there a bigger crisis lurking behind?

programme.title: That Demon Within
programme.desc: A dutiful police Dave, saves the life of a gang leader, Lin. When Lin commits another crime, Dave regrets his action and suffers from a severe mental disorder at the same time. He becomes a fugitive wanted for murder and tries to destroy Lin and his gang so as to restore his reputation as a good police officer.

programme.title: American Girl
programme.desc: 13 year-old Fen is uprooted from LA and moves to Taipei in early 2003, when her mother is diagnosed with breast cancer. She struggles to adjust to her new life with a new school and long-separated father, and drifts away from her mother. When her younger sister is misdiagnosed with SARS, they finally open up to each other during quarantine.

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the façade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: The Monkey is Back
programme.desc: The savior of the people, Stone Monkey, has given hope to a desperate little girl which he promises to realize. Years later, Stone Monkey is defeated in a battle with the three-eyed God of War, causing him to lose his power and falls into the mortal world. Can he fulfill his promise to the girl and stop the God of Wood from destroying earth?

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: A Better Tomorrow 2018
programme.desc: In this remake of John Woo's legendary heroic bloodshed movie, a former drug smuggler attempts to start his life anew and repair his relationship with his estranged brother, who is a rising star in the Police Narcotics Division.

programme.title: The Bullet Vanishes
programme.desc: A murder case which the bullet seems to disappear. A detective and his partner start the investigation that revolves around the questions of “Is shooting without bullets possible? How can a bullet disappear upon contact with a body?”

programme.title: Shining Moment
programme.desc: After being sidelined by the gymnastics team, Yu quits and reinvents himself as a Latin dance instructor. Starting afresh, he begins to assemble a group of children to compete in the Latin dance competition. But can Yu, still facing his own insecurities, bring out the best in these children and let them shine on stage?

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the country’s energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

Chow Mo Wan encounters many women in his life but is touched by none after he lost his true love. Following an encounter one day, he decides to write a fiction titled “2046” which takes place at Room 2046. Nothing ever changes at Room 2046, and people go there to find their lost memories.

programme.title: Raging Fire
programme.desc: As the police sets to arrest a drug lord, a team of masked thugs steals the drugs and murders the cops. Inspector Bong is devastated to see the aftermath of the carnage and soon discovers that the killers are led by Ngo, a former fellow cop who was forced into a life of crime by him. As the two men meet again, it is time to settle the score…

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent’s consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her…

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld King’s sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor’s death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, seek to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.title: Beyond The Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun’s warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: The Bells Of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: All Men Are Brothers
programme.desc: This is a sequel to Chang Cheh’s epic “The Water Margin”, and follows the patriotic story of seven warriors in the band of 108 outlaws at Mount Liang. The magnificent seven battle against the despotic government officials to save their country.

programme.title: The Amorous Lotus Pan
programme.desc: Adapted from the renowned Chinese novel, The Water Margin, this is the story of a poor and beautiful girl Lotus Pan, who is raped by her master and had to be married off to a midget who treats her badly. Lost and lonely, Pan unwittingly becomes a pawn in the game of lust between her husband’s playboy brother Wu Song, and a murderous man Men Ching.

programme.title: Mission Impossible
programme.desc: A sword master’s daughter is pursued and poisoned by an evil master when bringing back the stolen Golden Sword to the palace. She dies on the run and returns as a spirit to take revenge by killing the evil master, and soon vanishes after returning the sword to the emperor.

programme.title: The Venus' Tear Diamond
programme.desc: Legendary rival jewel thieves Fragrant Night and Nocturnal Earl travel to Japan to steal the famous Venus’ Tear Diamond. They fall quickly in love at first sight, without knowing the other person is their rival and is after the same prize. Who will get the diamond, and will it mean the end of their new found love?

programme.title: Four Riders
programme.desc: Four martial arts experts live in Seoul after the Korean War in the 1950s. One of them inexplicably crosses path with a drug trafficking syndicate, and his three friends have no choice but to fight a brutal battle on his side...

programme.title: Bat Without Wings
programme.desc: The Bat Without Wings, a notorious rapist-murderer, has returned after a five-year absence. A young swordsman and a convoy master investigate the case and suspect that the Bat may be framed. A saying goes that a treasure map is hidden under the Bat’s knife, so they try to use that to hunt the real culprit…

programme.title: The Land Of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, a young man, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and managed to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gang again while in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: The Kingdom And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. One year later, when he sends for Li, her poor health cannot stand the arduous journey and she arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: Danger Has Two Faces
programme.desc: Many years ago, Inspector Kam killed an innocent man and decided to resign from the police force. He became a professional killer who disguises as a pet store owner. When his best friend, Bobby begins investigating recent murder cases committed by Kam, he discovers that the mastermind behind these cases is actually his superintendent.

programme.title: Whose Baby Is In The Classroom?
programme.desc: Chen, a male teacher in an all girls’ high school, is stuck with a baby that isn’t his and must take care of it. As he lives on the school grounds, the baby is a source of constant distraction and worry! Luckily, his class warms to the baby and helps him take care of it while he works his charm on Li Ching, an uptight teacher in the same school.

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all the disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone in the temple except five Shaolin disciples. To take revenge on the Qing’s, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become “The Five Shaolin Masters”.

programme.title: Asia-Pol
programme.desc: Asiapol agent Yang Ming Xuan trails a shipment of contraband gold being delivered to gang leader, George Eaton. He enlists the help of a Chinese woman who is trying to avenge her sister and narrowly escapes several deadly traps as he closes in on Eaton's location. This spy film is loosely inspired by the James Bond movies.

programme.title: Vengeance Is A Golden Blade
programme.desc: Convoy Master Li’s wife has an affair with his rival Long, who plans to steal Li’s Golden Blade and kill him as well as his young daughter. Li and his daughter manage to escape and the latter grows up to be a skilled swordswoman who vows to avenge her mother’s death – a lie told by Li. The truth is revealed when she sees her mother alive by chance.

programme.title: Young Lovers
programme.desc: Guitar-playing rich kid, Yang Fan, heads to Japan to join a rock 'n' roll band where he soon finds himself competing for the affections of two beautiful girls.

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couple’s brothel.

programme.title: Descendant Of The Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: The Tiger And The Widow
programme.desc: The Liu Chia-liang trained Hui Ying-hung was considered the top action martial arts female star in the 1980s. It is her martial arts abilities that Michelle Yeoh tries to emulate. In The Tiger and the Widow, Hui Ying-hung is somehow mixed up in a salt smuggling ring that stinks of missing persons and rotten dilemmas.

programme.title: Love Without End
programme.desc: Lin Dai stars in this romantic classic as a nightclub singer who falls for a young architect. When he suffers grave financial difficulty, she does the unthinkable to help him.

programme.title: The Crimson Charm
programme.desc: In attempting to rescue some innocent people, swordsman Chiang Tzu-chao (Fang Mien) slays the son of Tsao Kang (Wang Hsia), leader of the ruthless Crimson Charm gang.The enraged father promises vengeance on the day of Chiang's 60th birthday...

programme.title: Passing Flickers
programme.desc: This film is an amusing insider’s look at the Hong Kong film industry and is based on Director Li Han Hsiang’s popular newspaper column recounting his work at Shaw Brothers. The collection of some of his funniest and most surreal film musings of the era, filled with behind-the-scene asides, this is a must-see for any Hong Kong cinema aficionado!

programme.title: The Web Of Death
programme.desc: To rule the martial arts world, the Head of the Snake Sect seeks to possess a deadly plant called “Five Poison Web”, spreading rumours on its whereabouts. Brothers Xiong and Kit are sent to investigate. Xiong falls in love with Su who has a clue of where the plant is, but she accidentally hurts Kit when seeking the plant, devastating Xiong.

programme.title: The Merry Wife
programme.desc: A 17-year old schoolgirl marries her 35-year-old teacher. Comedy ensues when they attempt to keep their relationship a secret despite being in the same school. When they discover unwanted suitors going after their other halves, jealousy threatens to expose their marriage any minute!

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up - will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: The Casino
programme.desc: After being separated for many years, two childhood lovers meet in a possibly mythical "Lucky Casino" and vow to rid the establishment of the corrupt military generals, criminals and extortionists!

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor’s sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: Cbi 5
programme.desc: Tamil CBI thriller film, Starring - Mammootty, Mukesh, Jagathy Sreekumar, Saikumar & Renji Panicker

programme.title: Sethupathi
programme.desc: Sethupathy features VIJAY SETHUPATHY & RAMYA NAMBEESAN. It is directed by S.A.Arunkumar & composed by Nivas K Prasanna. It received positive reviews from critics and was a commercial success

programme.title: Vanamagan
programme.desc: An Andaman tribal who escapes from men trying to capture his people, ends up in the care of a spoilt, rich girl, who starts to fall in love with him. The Film features Jayam Ravi & Sayeesha in the lead roles

programme.desc: Tamil Comedy Film, Starring, Nayantara, Yogi Babu, Saranya Ponvannan, Hareesh Peradi, Rajendran & Others

programme.desc: For 13-year-old Sheldon Cooper, it isn't easy growing up in East Texas. And while the vulnerable, gifted and somewhat naïve Sheldon deals with the world, his family must find a way to deal with him.

programme.title: In The Heart Of The Sea
programme.desc: Oscar® winner Ron Howard (A Beautiful Mind) directs the action adventure based on the best-selling book about the dramatic true journey of the whaling ship Essex. In the winter of 1820, the New England whaling vessel Essex was assaulted by something no one could believe: a whale of mammoth size and will, and an almost human sense of vengeance. The real-life maritime disaster would inspire Herman Melville's Moby Dick. But that told only half the story. In The Heart of The Sea reveals the encounter's harrowing aftermath, as the ship's surviving crew is pushed to their limits and forced to do the unthinkable to stay alive. Braving storms, starvation, panic and despair, the men will call into question their deepest beliefs, from the value of their lives to the morality of their trade, as their captain searches for direction on the open sea and his first mate (The Avengers' Chris Hemsworth) still seeks to bring the great whale down.

programme.title: The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon S10 Ep94
programme.desc: Emmy and Grammy Award-winning comedian Jimmy Fallon brings his unique high-energy comedy to the storied 60-year NBC franchise with his welcoming interview style, love of audience participation, spot-on impersonations and innovative sketches.

programme.title: Late Night With Seth Meyers S10 Ep69
programme.desc: Late Night with Seth Meyers is executive produced by the Emmy Award-winning Lorne Michaels and is home to A-list celebrity guests, memorable comedy and the best in musical talent.

programme.title: NCIS S20 Ep12
programme.desc: Following the cliffhanger Season 19 finale, with Special Agent Alden Parker still on the run with his ex-wife Vivian, the team investigates who from his past might have a personal vendetta against him in hopes of clearing Parker’s name.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep1
programme.desc: The World Needs S'more People Like You - Ten home bakers must create a dessert that represents their personality.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep2
programme.desc: Choc Full Of Impressions - Nine remaining home bakers use everyday items to make lasting chocolate impressions on the judges. Immunity is on the line for the bakers who are hoping for a fruitful outcome in the chocolate elimination challenge.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep3
programme.desc: Chocolate Panning, Spice & Everything Nice - The eight home bakers take on the ancient chocolate making technique of panning. The Chocolate Elimination Challenge gets a little spicy when the bakers are asked to infuse some fun flavors into their confections.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep4
programme.desc: Mirror, Mirror On The Glaze - Seven remaining competitors strive to mirror perfection when Chef Anna Olson teaches them how to use a mirror glaze technique. The home bakers create a decadent dessert inspired by a bestselling chocolate treat.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep5
programme.desc: I Have A Confection To Make - Only six home bakers remain and it's truly a spectacle, as they work in teams to take on the crown jewel of chocolate confections: the bonbon. It's bon voyage for one baker who fails to deliver an indulgent dessert.

programme.title: Great Chocolate Showdown Ep6
programme.desc: Life Is What You Bake It - The remaining bakers create centerpieces out of ordinary cupcakes.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America (S1) Ep1
programme.desc: Simon Reeve travels through the remote and little-visited north east of South America, from Venezuela to French Guiana.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return To The Wild UK (S1) Ep5
programme.desc: Exmoor - Ben Fogle returns to meet his previous contributors who set up home in remote locations. In this episode, he returns to the Exmoor National Park where Simon and Debbie Dawson live.

programme.title: Got Science? (S1) Ep7
programme.desc: Animals and Us - This episode explains the fascinating concept of cute aggression where animals evoke extreme emotions in human beings.

programme.title: Got Science? (S1) Ep8
programme.desc: Science of Travel - People are travelling like never before. There is a rise in frequent flyers and no one wants to spend their weekends at home any more. This episode aims to cater to a world that's always on its feet.

programme.title: Animals with Cameras (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: In this episode, on-board cameras make amazing discoveries about cheetahs, fur seals and chacma baboons.

programme.title: Extreme Treks (S3) Ep4
programme.desc: Laos - The Akha People - The Akha people are an indigenous hill tribe who live in villages in the remote mountains of Thailand, Myanmar and Laos. Join Ryan as he treks from village to village, staying with local Akha families.

programme.desc: To The Ends of the Earth - Starting on the treacherous Tea Horse Road stretching from southern China into Tibet, India and beyond. programme.title: Expedition with Steve Backshall (S2) Ep1

programme.title: Inside the Factory (S4) Ep3
programme.desc: Sausages - Gregg Wallace explores a factory that produces 625,000 sausages a day and Cherry Healey gets the scientific lowdown on getting the best banger.

programme.title: The Mating Game (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Jungles: In The Thick Of It - Jungles are home to 80% of all species but they cover just 2% of the planet. When animals in these crowded forests want to mate, the challenge is how to stand out from the crowd.

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Silk Road Adventure (S1) Ep3
programme.desc: Iran - Joanna continues her adventure following the ancient Silk Road across the Islamic Republic of Iran, home to one of the oldest civilizations on earth.

programme.title: Exploration Volcano (S1) Ep2
programme.desc: The Smoker - Mount Nyiragongo in the Democratic Republic of Congo erupts. It engulfs the nearby city of Goma with lava, taking thirty-three lives and destroying almost four-thousand homes. Chris arrives in Goma to find everyone else evacuating. After surveying the destruction, Chris joins volcanologists on an expedition to the source of the eruption.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge (S2) Ep8
programme.desc: Mauritius - In this episode Robson heads to Mauritius - a country famous for honeymooning couples - but he's going to fish.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - Dry Season Ep4
programme.desc: The dry season is the toughest time of year. With lower water levels and less space, animals need to quickly learn new skills to survive…and if they don’t, predatory vultures will swoop in for a feast.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Pointy Bits Ep5
programme.desc: Avoid the swords, spikes, and deadly hood ornaments on these alpha hunters. Observe elands locking corkscrew horns, storks rattling sabre-shaped beaks, rhinos scaring the competition with massive horns, and striped marlins spearing unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Scroungers/Scavengers Ep6
programme.desc: Go scavenging with nature’s cleanup crew. See Tasmanian devils get into food fights with rivals; learn how dung beetles roll over the competition; view wild boars’ fierce mating strategies; and watch hyenas’ bone-crushing teeth demolish any meal.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - Hluhluwe-Imfolozi Ep5
programme.desc: In the heart of Zululand, South Africa, lies the oldest game reserve on the African continent – Hluhluwe-iMfolozi. Here, Southern white rhinos have found protection from people in times of turmoil. Hunted almost to extinction at the end of the 19th century, the park’s establishment gave rhinos a lifeline – breeding them back from extinction.

programme.title: Seasons of the Wild 1 - The Everglades: The Season of Drought Ep1
programme.desc: In Southern Florida, a unique and complex ecosystem known as the Everglades has entered its winter season. Predator and prey are forced to live in close proximity due to a limited supply of water.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Foxes Ep1
programme.desc: Wild Wild East travels to Prince Edward Island to explore the family life of the Red Fox. These sly creatures are adept at living just on the fringes of the human world.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - Bahamas Exuma Cays Ep5
programme.desc: The Exuma Cays are a remote wonder: hundreds of tiny islands extending south from the Bahamian Capital of Nassau. In the 1950’s, developers dreamed of developing this pristine, and largely unexplored region. But before construction could begin, the Bahamian government supported an expedition to chart the cays. They liked what they saw, and in 1959 established the Bahamas National Trust, creating the Bahamas’ first Ocean Park.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Heidelberg Ep1
programme.desc: Explore beautiful Heidelberg Castle whose ruins stand in imposing wonder beside the river Neckar in Western Germany. Surrounded by a protected nature reserve, the castle is home to birds of prey and acts as a spawning ground for nearby amphibians.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - A Life Among Trees Ep3
programme.desc: How many trees can you find in the Amazon? And what’s it like to live up in them? Travel through the canopy and see how more than 1200 species of trees coexist. Plus, follow monkeys and other creatures who call these trees home.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - Dry Season Ep4
programme.desc: The dry season is the toughest time of year. With lower water levels and less space, animals need to quickly learn new skills to survive…and if they don’t, predatory vultures will swoop in for a feast.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Pointy Bits Ep5
programme.desc: Avoid the swords, spikes, and deadly hood ornaments on these alpha hunters. Observe elands locking corkscrew horns, storks rattling sabre-shaped beaks, rhinos scaring the competition with massive horns, and striped marlins spearing unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Scroungers/Scavengers Ep6
programme.desc: Go scavenging with nature’s cleanup crew. See Tasmanian devils get into food fights with rivals; learn how dung beetles roll over the competition; view wild boars’ fierce mating strategies; and watch hyenas’ bone-crushing teeth demolish any meal.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - Hluhluwe-Imfolozi Ep5
programme.desc: In the heart of Zululand, South Africa, lies the oldest game reserve on the African continent – Hluhluwe-iMfolozi. Here, Southern white rhinos have found protection from people in times of turmoil. Hunted almost to extinction at the end of the 19th century, the park’s establishment gave rhinos a lifeline – breeding them back from extinction.

programme.title: Seasons of the Wild 1 - The Everglades: The Season of Drought Ep1
programme.desc: In Southern Florida, a unique and complex ecosystem known as the Everglades has entered its winter season. Predator and prey are forced to live in close proximity due to a limited supply of water.

programme.title: Ocean Parks 1 - Bahamas Exuma Cays Ep5
programme.desc: The Exuma Cays are a remote wonder: hundreds of tiny islands extending south from the Bahamian Capital of Nassau. In the 1950’s, developers dreamed of developing this pristine, and largely unexplored region. But before construction could begin, the Bahamian government supported an expedition to chart the cays. They liked what they saw, and in 1959 established the Bahamas National Trust, creating the Bahamas’ first Ocean Park.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Rivers Ep2
programme.desc: Wild Wild East swims in the Rivers of Nova Scotia. Two species of fish, the Shad and the Gaspereau swim upstream to their ancestral spawning grounds, while a colony of Double-Crested Cormorants thrive on the mouth of the Pictou River.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - A Life Among Trees Ep3
programme.desc: How many trees can you find in the Amazon? And what’s it like to live up in them? Travel through the canopy and see how more than 1200 species of trees coexist. Plus, follow monkeys and other creatures who call these trees home.

programme.title: Surviving the Amazon 1 - Dry Season Ep4
programme.desc: The dry season is the toughest time of year. With lower water levels and less space, animals need to quickly learn new skills to survive…and if they don’t, predatory vultures will swoop in for a feast.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - City of Riches Ep1
programme.desc: Stake out the Bay Family’s lush territory, where matriarch Anna offers lavish feasts but faces internal dissent. Size up her rival Mia, the streetwise Townies leader who’s eyeing a lifestyle upgrade, and check in with the isolated Mangrove Family.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Pointy Bits Ep5
programme.desc: Avoid the swords, spikes, and deadly hood ornaments on these alpha hunters. Observe elands locking corkscrew horns, storks rattling sabre-shaped beaks, rhinos scaring the competition with massive horns, and striped marlins spearing unsuspecting prey.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 2 - Scroungers/Scavengers Ep6

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - Hluhluwe-Imfolozi Ep5

programme.title: Seasons of the Wild 1 - The Everglades: The Season of Drought Ep1
programme.desc: In Southern Florida, a unique and complex ecosystem known as the Everglades has entered its winter season. Predator and prey are forced to live in close proximity due to a limited supply of water.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Skies Ep3
programme.desc: Take to the sky to soar with the Bald Eagle. From Cape Breton’s Bras d’Or Lake, to the bird’s overwintering home in the Annapolis Valley, the Eagle’s raise families, hunt and forage for food, and compete for territory with another bird of prey, the Osprey.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Tides Ep4
programme.desc: Follow the ebb and flow of the tides. Over a hundred thousand sandpipers migrating from the Arctic to South America make a pit stop along the Bay of Fundy. On the other side of Nova Scotia, the rocky-coastline provides a home for harbor and grey seals.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Lemurs of Anja Mountain Ep1
programme.desc: Millions of years ago, castaway creatures found themselves stranded on Madagascar’s rugged shores. Isolated from the mainland, the newcomers were left to evolve. This is a magical world of rare and unique creatures perfectly adapted to their tropical hideaway.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Carcassonne Ep2
programme.desc: Travel to a centuries-old French fortress, home to some of history's greatest empires. Carcassone, once a center of wealth and culture, is now a haven for wildlife. Birds, wild boar, and armies of insects endure in its bountiful surroundings.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home Ep2
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Island of the White Shark Ep1
programme.desc: Off Guadalupe Island, Mexico, top shark ecologist Mauricio Hoyos attempts a television first. Get a unique view as he attaches a camera to the dorsal fin of a great white, revealing how it swims, hunts, and ultimately strikes its prey.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 2 - Hluhluwe-Imfolozi Ep5
programme.desc: In the heart of Zululand, South Africa, lies the oldest game reserve on the African continent – Hluhluwe-iMfolozi. Here, Southern white rhinos have found protection from people in times of turmoil. Hunted almost to extinction at the end of the 19th century, the park’s establishment gave rhinos a lifeline – breeding them back from extinction.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Home Away from Home Ep2
programme.desc: Swim upriver with the Bay Family, where Anna offers a hand raising her grandpups before heading home to find interlopers on her turf. Watch a flood in the mangroves nearly sweep away a baby, and see the Townies eat clean through their resources.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Island of the White Shark Ep1
programme.desc: Off Guadalupe Island, Mexico, top shark ecologist Mauricio Hoyos attempts a television first. Get a unique view as he attaches a camera to the dorsal fin of a great white, revealing how it swims, hunts, and ultimately strikes its prey.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Tsiba's New Mum Ep4
programme.desc: Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope’s tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - A Pangolin's Plight Ep5
programme.desc: Feel heartbreak when Dr. Amanda’s team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but cheer when another is released post-rehab. Check on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the center’s baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Pollinators Ep5
programme.desc: The Annapolis Valley is the Wild Wild East’s most important agricultural center. We dive into the hive to explore the complex social structures of hardworking honeybees. The Monarch butterfly has traveled all the way from Mexico to feed off the local milkweed.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - City Ep6
programme.desc: It’s Halifax through the eyes of its wildest residents. During the day, squirrels and chipmunks compete for territory in the city park. At night, Halifax’s raccoons invade backyards and seagulls scour the streets for pizza.

programme.title: Land of Primates 1 - Lemurs of Madagascar Ep2
programme.desc: The island is the land of Lemurs. Lemurs are fascinating arboreal primitive primates of Madagascar represented in all sizes, colors, and shapes from the largest Indri to the tiny mouse lemur.

programme.title: Wild Castles 1 - Predjama Ep3
programme.desc: Discover the world's largest castle carved into a cave. Predjama, in Slovenia, has provided protection not only for its Medieval human inhabitants, but also serves as a haven for the birds, boars, and mountain goats that live in the region.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - A Busy Bay Ep3
programme.desc: Get ready to rumble in Marina Bay, where the Nomads and Townies are squatting while Anna and the Bay Family are away upriver. Soak up the peaceful otter life in this luxurious waterway before the surprise early return of its rightful owners.

programme.title: Shark Squad 1 - Bimini Sharklab Ep2
programme.desc: Travel to a remote part of the Bahamas to unlock shark secrets. Do they make friends? Where do they give birth? Are some bolder than others? The answers may help protect these supreme predators for generations to come.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 2 - Tsiba's New Mum Ep4
programme.desc: Tackle an emergency when Dr. Amanda removes a sable antelope’s tracking collar, and see the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom. Free two orphaned serval cats and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.desc: Travel to a remote part of the Bahamas to unlock shark secrets. Do they make friends? Where do they give birth? Are some bolder than others? The answers may help protect these supreme predators for generations to come.

programme.title: How the Wild Things Sleep
programme.desc: There is an endless variety of sleep-strategies among animals, yet it seems a universal behavior. But why bother with sleep at all? How do animals cope without sleep or the dangers of being unconscious in the wild? Just some of the baffling questions that lead through How the Wild Things Sleep.

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bee’s Diary tells that story.

programme.desc: Should you meddle with a classic? Nigella thinks that in the case of her crab mac'n'cheese, it's a must. She also cooks up chocolate cookies, chicken with orzo and a rice-filled dessert.

programme.title: Grand Designs (S19) Ep7
programme.desc: East Essex - Ex-advertising man Geoff has decided to spend his golden years building a dramatically cantilevered steel framed house right on a flood plain. At age 63 Geoff is selling his luxury villa in Spain to take on the challenge.

programme.desc: Becky and David's Yurt - Simon and the team meet semi-retired couple Becky and David to help them convert their drab old yurt into an a colourful and inviting bijou B&B.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep17
programme.desc: Lake Ball Pit / The Poppy Corn Festival - Cannonball! Archibald becomes a lifeguard at Lake Ball Pit. When Loy can't get along with a rival, Archibald gets a lesson in the art of sarcasm.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep44
programme.desc: Worms Of Endearment / Dr Strangegrug Or How I Learned To Stop Worrying And Love The Spear - Lerk and Thunk hide all the valley's worms in a cave to protect them from the hunters who want to use them as bait; Grug invents the spear and pitches it to the Valley as a tool that will change cavemanity forever!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep43
programme.desc: Lucky And The Escape Artist - Soon-to-be-big sister Lucky “borrows” Snips for a day to see what it’s like to have a little sibling, but nothing goes as planned

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep43
programme.desc: The Dread Pirate Richie / Crush 4U Where Ru? - A tech-obsessed Richie struggles to stick to the pirate code. Richie surprises the girls with a robotic boy band -- modeled after Crush 4U!

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep43
programme.desc: Desserted Island/Dry Spell - The crew gets stranded on a candy-filled mystery island; Burn isn't herself after a losing streak so the crew goes to extreme lengths to help her win.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep17
programme.desc: Mecha-Menace - Magnus and Axel unveil their new "mechano-dragon." It's impressive at first, but the Riders set out to prove it's no better than a bucket of bolts.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep17
programme.desc: Lake Ball Pit / The Poppy Corn Festival - Cannonball! Archibald becomes a lifeguard at Lake Ball Pit. When Loy can't get along with a rival, Archibald gets a lesson in the art of sarcasm.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep43
programme.desc: Only The Lucky Survive / Shar-Squad - Tip tricks Oh into thinking he's invincible to convince him to go on a dangerous adventure/Sharzod takes revenge when she loses her squad to her arch-rival Fance

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep43
programme.desc: That Sinking Feeling - When Masikura convinces King Julien that the island is sinking, Julien believes building an ark is the only way to save his people

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep3
programme.desc: Vienna Voice-Versa - When Whitebeard attempts to magically enhance his voice for a singing duet with an old Wizard friend, he accidentally switches bodies with Arf. Now, with Dog-Whitebeard stalling the show, it's up to Wally and Wenda to reverse the mix-up before the concert.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep43
programme.desc: Doc Doc Who'S There?/Tour Guide Of Duty - In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep8
programme.desc: Twig For A Day/Eternal Day - In an attempt to understand Twig better and demonstrate their appreciation for him, the Mighty Ones try to live a day as Twig. But when they end up in a precarious situation, four Twigs won't do, and they must utilize their individual strengths in order to save themselves. / The humans in the house install a very bright light in the backyard, creating an eternal day for the Mighty Ones, who get a little loopy as a result.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep44
programme.desc: Chicago - Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep43
programme.desc: Prey Time - When the Senior Puss Squad is in trouble and needs his help, Puss is alone in the woods trying to survive an unknown assassin's dangerous attack

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep17
programme.desc: Almost Famoose: Chapter Four - Rocky and Bullwinkle return to Frostbite Falls to discover that because they failed to rebuild the giant birdbath, their beloved town is now completely overrun with dirty, zombie-like birds.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep43
programme.desc: Not Lout - When Snotlout screws up a mission, he must learn to be a leader and earn the trust of the other riders.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep43
programme.desc: Kral Zera - While the team struggles to come to an agreement, Haggar’s motives to take the throne escalate to epic proportions

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep43
programme.desc: Only The Lucky Survive / Shar-Squad - Tip tricks Oh into thinking he's invincible to convince him to go on a dangerous adventure/Sharzod takes revenge when she loses her squad to her arch-rival Fance

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep43
programme.desc: That Sinking Feeling - When Masikura convinces King Julien that the island is sinking, Julien believes building an ark is the only way to save his people

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep3
programme.desc: Vienna Voice-Versa - When Whitebeard attempts to magically enhance his voice for a singing duet with an old Wizard friend, he accidentally switches bodies with Arf. Now, with Dog-Whitebeard stalling the show, it's up to Wally and Wenda to reverse the mix-up before the concert.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep43
programme.desc: Doc Doc Who'S There?/Tour Guide Of Duty - In order to improve her bedside manner, Doctor Moonbloom embarks on a new career as a comedian. But could it be that this is her true calling?/ Branch is sick of Trolls not coming to him with their problems. Seeking to prove that he is a helpful Troll, he agrees to assist Tug Duluth in finding a new tour.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep8
programme.desc: Twig For A Day/Eternal Day - In an attempt to understand Twig better and demonstrate their appreciation for him, the Mighty Ones try to live a day as Twig. But when they end up in a precarious situation, four Twigs won't do, and they must utilize their individual strengths in order to save themselves. / The humans in the house install a very bright light in the backyard, creating an eternal day for the Mighty Ones, who get a little loopy as a result.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep44
programme.desc: Chicago - Boss and family go on Spring Break to visit his grandparents in the big city of Chicago. Boss uses the trip to test his business mettle, by getting in a promotion war at a real big adult company. And when a department store refuses to let Gigi and Tim return an item, they wind up unionizing the entire sales force.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep45
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgängers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep43
programme.desc: Prey Time - When the Senior Puss Squad is in trouble and needs his help, Puss is alone in the woods trying to survive an unknown assassin's dangerous attack

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep17
programme.desc: Almost Famoose: Chapter Four - Rocky and Bullwinkle return to Frostbite Falls to discover that because they failed to rebuild the giant birdbath, their beloved town is now completely overrun with dirty, zombie-like birds.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep43
programme.desc: Not Lout - When Snotlout screws up a mission, he must learn to be a leader and earn the trust of the other riders.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep43
programme.desc: Kral Zera - While the team struggles to come to an agreement, Haggar’s motives to take the throne escalate to epic proportions

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep43
programme.desc: Only The Lucky Survive / Shar-Squad - Tip tricks Oh into thinking he's invincible to convince him to go on a dangerous adventure/Sharzod takes revenge when she loses her squad to her arch-rival Fance

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep43
programme.desc: That Sinking Feeling - When Masikura convinces King Julien that the island is sinking, Julien believes building an ark is the only way to save his people

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep3
programme.desc: Vienna Voice-Versa - When Whitebeard attempts to magically enhance his voice for a singing duet with an old Wizard friend, he accidentally switches bodies with Arf. Now, with Dog-Whitebeard stalling the show, it's up to Wally and Wenda to reverse the mix-up before the concert.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep25
programme.desc: The Case Of The Torn-Out Pages - Someone's ripped out the final pages of Queen Sparklewings Fairytale book! Who could it be ? Noddy needs to find out fast and restore the pages to the book or the Queen's special fairytale storytelling will be cancelled.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep26
programme.desc: The Case Of The Bird That Can'T Fly - Noddy finds a bird in Pat-Pat's Treehouse that doesn't seem to be able to fly. He decides to investigate: how can they help the bird to fly? Noddy finds out that the bird can fly – it just doesn't want to. But why ?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep27
programme.desc: The Case Of The Clockwork Mouse Mystery - Everyone in Toyland is excited about the first ever Winter Light Festival - except its organiser, Clockwork Mouse who is moving at super fast speed. Noddy investigates why she's acting so strangely. He works out that she's been trying to move at triple speed to get everything sorted in time. Noddy helps her realise that she doesn't have to do all the festival preparations on her own. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep28
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Smartysaurus - For the Night of the Stars, Noddy invites all his friends at home to look at the stars through his telescope. Smartysaurus will bring a map of the stars so everyone can spot them. But when the party starts, Smartysaurus hasn't arrived. Noddy investigates and finds out his big friend couldn't fit through his small front door so she'd shrunk herself! Noddy has to help Smartysaurus get back to her proper size and find a way for everyone to enjoy the Night of the Stars together. Good job, Noddy.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep25
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Night Noises - Raa Raa and his friends get lost in the dark while out looking for fireflies but Raa Raa guides the way back home.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep26
programme.desc: Raa Raa Plays Do What I Do - Raa Raa is playing a new game called Do What I Do with his friends but a misunderstanding upsets Topsy.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep1
programme.desc: A Time To Be Quiet. A Time To Be Loud - Raa Raa has spotted an exciting new thing in the jungle. What could it be? As they try to get close to the "flappy fly", Raa Raa discovers that some situations call for absolute quiet… not something our noisy little lion is very good at!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep2
programme.desc: The Right Sound - One of the pipes on Huffty's Toot Stick has broken. Can Raa Raa help his friend find the "right" sound to replace it in the jungle so they can play loud music together?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep25
programme.desc: Home Is Where The Hatch Is - Breeze and Roary swap places for the day (and night). Roary soon discovers the beach is no place for a racing car to live, while Breeze misses the freedom of the beach.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep26
programme.desc: Putting On A Show - The cars are all gleaming for this evening's race. Roary gets bored and heads out onto the track - with disastrous consequences. Will the cars be ready in time for the big show?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep27
programme.desc: Motor Mouth - The track inspector is coming to visit and Big Chris is too tired to commentate on the race. A celebrity commentator is brought in to save the day - much to Big Chris' anger.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep28
programme.desc: Dancing Queen - Christine is due to take part in a dancing competition and is practising at Silver Hatch. But what happens when her dance partner is taken ill?

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep13
programme.desc: Fleshed Out / Messy Business At The Manor - Fleshed Out Wolfie wakes up one morning to every creature's nightmare?he's turned into a human! Messy Business At The Manor When Mosshead has nowhere to go for vacation, Casper invites him to stay at his uncles' house…where he quickly discovers that Mosshead is the world's worst houseguest.

programme.title: Casper'S Scare School Ep14
programme.desc: Paramedic Paranormal / Back To Ghoul - Paramedic Paranormal When Jimmy breaks out in hives, Casper and his friends have no choice but to bring him to the human hospital. Back To Ghoul When Casper's uncles Stinky, Fatso and Stretch decide to go back to Scare School, Casper is thrilled.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep44
programme.desc: He Got Game Night/73 - Turbo tries to juggle two dates at a party without being caught; White Shadow takes Skid's advice on superstitions to keep his winning streak alive.

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep18
programme.desc: The Paperbirds / Rock And Egg Roll - A gang of crooks mistakes Archibald for a criminal mastermind. Archibald unearths a rock with mysterious — and feather-raising — powers.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep45
programme.desc: Baby Boss - Mom and Dad are panicking after Gigi noticed Boss isn't growing, so Boss "puts himself under", taking a special formula that will turn him int a regular baby long enough to pass a Doctor's checkup. However, with Boss gone, all the villains from this season see it as the perfect time to strike Baby Corp, leaving Staci to hold the floodgates.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep46
programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep44
programme.desc: Saving Shattermaster - When Mala and the Defenders of the Wing find a mysterious stranger who looks suspiciously like Dagur, Hiccup and Heather go to investigate.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep44
programme.desc: Breaking Good - When Dulcinea sets up a school to teach unruly thieves how to be good, Uli takes the idea too far and it's up to Puss to make San Lorenzo normal

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep44
programme.desc: The Jungle Rooster - When the Jungle Rooster keeps him up at night, Julien discovers that the Foosa have been farming chickens for food and risks his life to free them all

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep44
programme.desc: Troll Playing Game/ Finn Cascade - Poppy discovers Branch hosting a Trolly roleplaying game in his Bunker. But when she joins the game, she insists on prioritizing fun over the rules, posing in-game problems for Branch./ Branch goes to great lengths to get a picture with Finn Cascade, the coolest fish in the Trolls Lagoon. But it seems as though Finn isn’t interested…

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep44
programme.desc: Garby'S Gang - When Garby must look after the Flatirons by himself he discovers that D-Structs and Blayde plan to attack, so he rallies a band of Trux to fight back

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep18
programme.desc: Summer Holiday - In need of some rest and relaxation, the Riders head out on vacation. But their supposedly perfect island getaway isn't quite what they hoped for.

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep9
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Spring Lamb - Julian's preparing for “spring has sprung”, the Greendale school play, when pat gets a special delivery call. It's a yeti costume for Bill. When Pat is diverted into the countryside by PC Selby, he spots one of Alf's missing sheep - and she's about to have a lamb! Alf can't get there as his quad bike is being fixed, so Pat offers to take the sheep in his van. But the sheep is reluctant to move. Meanwhile, Bill is worried that his costume won't turn up and he'll let his classmates down. Out in the fields, Pat hits upon the idea of dressing up like a woolly sheep by putting on the yeti costume. It works! But there's another surprise in store as he delivers the sheep to alf at the school - she's had her lamb! Bill, Pat and lamb all play starring roles in the play. Mission Accomplished!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep10
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Painted Sheep - Pat has got to deliver special cans of blue dye for Alf to mark up his cheeky runaway sheep. That way, when they get out, he can work out which sheep belong to him! Meanwhile, the kids are having a special delivery service day of their own as Ben gives them a tour of the Sorting Office. It's not much fun as Ben won't let them touch anything – and when they do, they cause chaos! Meanwhile, Alf's sheep have runaway and Pat can't find either them or Alf! By using the tracking device on Alf's phone and deputising the kids to be act as “special delivery deputies”, Pat is eventually able to locate Alf and the runaway sheep! Mission accomplished!

programme.title: Olivia Ep37
programme.desc: Olivia Visits The Aquarium - On a school trip to the aquarium, Olivia and her classmates compete to be the first to view all the exhibits and win a chance to help feed the sea-lions. Olivia is partnered with Francine, and the two girls have to reconcile their different approaches in order to win the prize.

programme.title: Olivia Ep38
programme.desc: Olivia And The Anniversary Surprise - It's Olivia's parents' anniversary, and they're planning a night out at a special restaurant. When they can't find a babysitter, Grandma happily volunteers. When Olivia suggests they all surprise Mum and Dad at dinner, she discovers the restaurant isn't at all the way she imagined, but it's a lot more fun!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep35
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Pizza - Mr Carburettor has demanded pizza for lunch but the pizzeria is closed. How is Marsha going to ensure Mr Carburettor gets the lunch he asked for?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep36
programme.desc: Silver Hatch Stars - Roary is feeling put out as all the cars are paying Conrod too much attention. He is determined to show his worth when they race that afternoon. But tries too hard and ends up in danger. Who can save him?

programme.title: Archibald'S Next Big Thing Ep18
programme.desc: The Paperbirds / Rock And Egg Roll - A gang of crooks mistakes Archibald for a criminal mastermind. Archibald unearths a rock with mysterious — and feather-raising — powers.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep44
programme.desc: Lucky And The Thin Ice - The frontier gets a chill when Lucky, Spirit and the PALs attempt to rescue a missing girl

programme.title: Harvey Girls Forever! Ep44
programme.desc: Bobby The Influence / Grill Or Be Grilled - While upholding the law on "The Elder's Court," Bobby is accused of a crime. Richie vows to turn his grilled cheese stand into a profitable business.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep29
programme.desc: The Case Of The Silent Parrot - The Pirate Captain is very worried. Scurvy the parrot isn't saying a word. Without him navigating they won't be able to go treasure hunting anymore! Why is Scurvy so quiet? Is there something wrong? Or is he hiding something? It's up to Noddy to investigate!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep30
programme.desc: The Case Of The Vanished Ninjas - The Ninjas are preparing for an acrobatics show. But after Pat-Pat decorates them with glitter they don't turn up for their rehearsal. Noddy investigates, looking for the Ninjas, but only finds sticky things have gone missing round Toyland - Pat-Pat's glue-stick, the Naughticorns' sticky tape, the Builders' sticky putty. Noddy works out that the glitter made the Ninjas non sticky, so they borrowed sticky things to try and make themselves sticky again. Case closed!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep31
programme.desc: The Case Of The Missing Suitcase - Pat-Pat is packing for a sleepover at the Palace when her suitcase goes missing. Noddy follows the clues and discovers that the Pockets took the suitcase in order to get Pat-Pat's sleepy pillow. They wanted to keep the pillow because it reminds them of Pat-Pat and they would miss her while she was at the sleepover. Noddy finds the Pockets and the suitcase in the dark, just in time for the sleepover. Queen Sparklewings invites everyone to the sleepover. Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep32
programme.desc: The Case Of The Two Parties - The Naughticorns are having a party and naturally they want everyone to come. Trouble is, so are the Pirates. But when no one turns up to either party, Noddy investigates: Why has no one come to either party?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep3
programme.desc: Huffty Loses His Voice - Huffty has lost his voice. While Raa Raa and his friends try and work out what has happened to it, Huffty has to mime to make himself understood.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion Ep4
programme.desc: Raa Raa Finds A Voice - Raa Raa is upset when Topsy suggests that he should stick to doing "Raa Raa" things. He sets out to prove Topsy wrong. Will the noisy little lion learn that sometimes it's best just to be yourself?
